com.ichess.game

Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ichess.game.Game

  • public class Game
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a Chess game.
    The game is by default initialized to the starting position, however you can load a custom position using from FEN string using FEN.loadGame or load both position and moves from a PGN String by using PGN.loadGame.
    By default a game does not have time control or limits. You can set time limit using setTimeLimitForGame and setTimeIncrementPerMove. You can check if time runs out using isOutOfTime.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Ran Berenfeld

      • getMoveNumber

        public int getMoveNumber()
        Returns the current PGN style move number. e.g 1 if this game is in the first move of white or black, 2 if this game is in the second move of white or black, etc. This can be override when loading FEN.
        Returns:

      • isEnded

        public boolean isEnded()

      • isOutOfTime

        public boolean isOutOfTime(int color)
        Checks if the given player is out of time If it's not the current color turn, just check if it ran out of time. If it's the current color turn, the game also checks if the player already exceeded its time left (relative to now) minus 5 seconds bonus time to the player, to allow for a LAG in networks.
        Parameters:
        color - Color to check
        Returns:
        true if the player is out of time. otherwise false.

                              int incrementInSeconds)
        Sets time increment, per move, for the given color, in seconds. This should be set together with setTimeLimitForGame.
        Parameters:
        color - a given color
        incrementInSeconds - increment for each move, in seconds.
        Returns:
        true on success, otherwise false.

      • offerDraw

        public void offerDraw(int color)
        Signals that the given color offers draw. The draw request will be cleared if a move is played (or taken back). If both sides offered draw, the game will be ended (same as calling drawMutual())
        Parameters:
        color - the given color

      • setTimeLimitForGame

        public boolean setTimeLimitForGame(int color,
                          int timeInMinutes)

        Parameters:
        color - a given color
        timeInMinutes - time limit for the entire game, in minutes
        Returns:
        true on success, otherwise false.
